title: Getting into jeans
creator_credit: AVCOM Productions, Ross D Wylie, Chris Strange and Paul Wingate
brief_description: Graeme (Shirley) Strachan presents an overview of the production of a pair of jeans from the beginning of the design process through to the sale to the customer. Shows the function of computers in laying out pattern pieces to the material available, the machinist at work, and the activity of wholesalers and retailers.
